overview:
Patricia is a Director with the Highland Consumer Fund and specializes in consumer goods and services. She is actively involved in Highland’s investment in City Sports and Pharmaca.

Background Prior to joining Highland, Patricia worked at Club Monaco (a division of Polo Ralph Lauren) where she gained extensive strategy and operational experience within the retail industry. Patricia worked with senior management to develop the divisionâ€™s business plan and was responsible for the financial planning and budgeting of the retailerâ€™s 100 stores. She began her career as an investment banker at Morgan Stanley. Based in both the Hong Kong and New York offices, Patricia advised clients in the real estate, telecommunications and media industries, working on principal investments within Morgan Stanleyâ€™s real estate fund and advising on telecom investments in China and Korea.
